name: Vee's Village
description:
This is a small tech demo for Ludum Dare 43 to test out my fantasy console project, Galapagos. I may return to it with a fleshed out design and production in the future. I'm mostly interested in technical feedback on the stability and performance of this build.

You are Vee, a vampire who thirsts for the blood of villagers. However, to get villagers to prey on, she has to build the village herself.

How to play: Press the arrow keys to move around the map. Press the "A" key to pick up rocks and gain material. Press the "S" key to turn the material into walls near you. When villagers appear, run into them to gain strength.
